title: Using different devices/IP
body:
Am I at risk of getting banned if I log into my account using a different IP and device? I've been playing all year on the same device and IP. Now im gonna spend a week in a house I have in a different city and I'm planning on using the laptop here to play league, after this I'll return and play on what i've been playing since the beginning of 2016

Thx in advance.

replies.body:
It's perfectly normal to travel and play League while you're away from home. This in itself is typically not something that will put your account at risk of a suspension.

Travel safe, and let me know if you have any questions~
Plenty of people travel around and play LoL, I don't think you have anything to worry about.
